---
category: news
title: "New take on machine learning helps us 'scale up' phase transitions"
excerpt: "Researchers from Tokyo Metropolitan University have enhanced \"super-resolution\" machine learning techniques to study phase transitions. They identified key features of how large arrays of interacting particles behave at different temperatures by simulating tiny arrays before using a convolutional neural network to generate a good estimate of what a larger array would look like using correlation configurations."
